text.0: commingling restless he ascends the sky unveiling nights and all that stands or moves.
text.1: as he the sole god is preeminent in greatness among all these other gods.
text.2: all men are joyful in thy power o god that living from the dry wood thou art born.
text.3: all truly share thy godhead while they keep in their accustomed ways eternal law.
text.4: strong is the thought of law the laws behest all works have they performed he quickens all.
text.5: whoso will bring oblation gifts to thee to him bethinking thee vouchsafe thou wealth.
text.6: seated as priest with manus progeny of all these treasures he alone is lord.
text.7: men yearn for children to prolong their line and are not disappointed in their hope.
text.8: eagerly they who hear his word fulfil his wish as sons obey their sires behest.
text.9: he rich in food unbars his wealth like doors he the housefriend hath decked heavens vault with stars.
